game.name: Lycah
game.genres: Adventure, Casual, Indie, RPG, Simulation, Strategy
game.categories: Single-player, Partial Controller Support, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: Lycah - The Enchantress is an exciting game from the team behind the Thorne series that puts you in the role of Lycah, a young woman troubled by her past.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Lycah - The Enchantress is an exciting game from the team behind the Thorne series that puts you in the role of Lycah, a young woman troubled by her past.

reviewHighlights.text: Not for me, but seems alright.
